resources.string: Using Wi-Fi at home? Try using Smart settings to have it turn on when you're home.
Using Bluetooth at home? Try using Smart settings to have it turn on when you're home.
Setting phone to Sound at home? Try using Smart settings to change sound profile when you're home.
Turn Wi-Fi on when at home
Turn Wi-Fi off when at home
Turn Bluetooth on when at home
Turn Bluetooth off when at home
Change sound profile to Silent when at home
Change sound profile to Vibrate only when at home
Change sound profile to Sound when at home
